Summary: Star like with Redish Blue flashing and dramatic movement
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There was one other sighting in London on or around July 16th 2008
divs: sighting detailswe noticed 3 at first, we watched 2 leave the sky in a fire fly type motion. it would be very bright, then go dull and appear farther down the sky again. one of the coolest events that happend was, the 3rd object that stayed for over an hour, whilst it was moving around from left\right and up\down very randomly, it moved so fast and akwardly that to our vision it looked sorta like a lightning bolt for a split second. me and my friend both witness these events aswell. often at times, the object would fade right out so that you could not see it. another amazing event was, we noticed the object flash, then it showed a red, then blue light im a strange pattern, then we seen another object appear beside it then shoot off into the sky. myself witnessed, the object emitting a lightning like light beside the object that happend a few times, and the color of this light was blue and white. my friend did not witness that part. instead of the clips, i will attach my youtube profile wich has all 3 clips i have. the clips were not on the same date as the above desription. the vidoes were on the 17th and 18th of july. all videos were filmed in london ontario. i must add, if you guys have anyone in london, or close by. i can garentee 100% they will see ufos in the clear sky at night. i apologize for the video quality, they were filmed with a pretty bad digital camera. but they are 100% geniune, i have a witness to back it up. http:\\www.youtube.com\shawnold
